DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether screen pregnant woman history previous preterm delivery , week , bacterial vaginosis use VA-SENSE , treatment positive woman reduce risk spontaneous preterm birth . We compare effectiveness week screen pregnancy screening .
DOC.brief_title: Va-Sense - Bacterial Vaginosis Once A Week Screening And Treatment To Reduce Infective Complications , Abortion And Preterm Delivery In Pregnant Women With Previous Preterm Delivery
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant subject , age 1850 year , pregnancy week 10 less 20 less , history previous preterm delivery . 2 . Subject ready sign inform consent form . 1 . Subject ruptured membrane . 2 . Subject sign symptoms bacterial vaginosis Trichomoniasis infection . 3 . Subject blood vaginal secretion . 4 . Subject currently participate another clinical study . 5 . Subject unable unwilling cooperate study procedure .
